description: An examination at an advanced level of the general principles applicable to contracts of insurance including insurable interests, disclosure, misrepresentation, agency, formation of contracts, policy terms and construction, claims, indemnity and regulations.
restricted:
GCAppLaw, GDipAppLaw, MAppLaw, LLM, LLM(Adv), LLM(#16), LLM(#24), MICLaw
Quota: Minimum of 12 enrolments
